content: I see. That's a bit limiting. I've been using my Humidistat nasal aspirator regularly to help relieve my sinus pressure and congestion, and it's been a lifesaver. I was hoping to integrate it with my Omron blood pressure monitor to get a more complete picture of my overall health. Maybe I'll look into third-party apps that can help me track my respiratory health alongside my blood pressure readings. Can you recommend any apps that might be suitable for this purpose?
